attributes.action: Renew red, Amber and green list rules for entering England
attributes.additional_details:
Arrival from green list countries will be able to enter UK with negative pcr test.
Arrival from Amber list countries those who vaccinated against covid-19 able to enter UK with negative pcr test
Arrival from red list must have a strong purpose of entry,present negative test result of pcr and has to be vaccinated and also self isolated for 10 days at home.
attributes.background: Green list enter with negative pcr, allow vaccinated people to enter UK from Amber list and pcr, self isolated for who come from red list with negative pcr and vaccinated 10 days at home

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072

Review quarantine rules for international arrivals travelling for work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574771
